contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Feel free to reach out through any of these platforms. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

about.title: Building digital products, brands, and experiences
about.intro1: I'm a passionate software engineer with a deep love for creating innovative solutions. My journey in tech began with a curiosity about how things work, which led me to explore various aspects of software development.
about.intro2: With experience in full-stack development, I've had the opportunity to work on diverse projects ranging from web applications to AI-powered solutions. I'm interested in creating user-centric applications that solve real-world problems.

senior.title: Senior Software Engineer
senior.description: Leading the development of web applications using React and Node.js. Implementing CI/CD pipelines and mentoring junior developers.
achievements: Reduced application load time by 40% through optimization
Led team of 5 developers in successful project delivery
Implemented automated testing increasing coverage to 85%

fullstack.title: Full Stack Developer
fullstack.description: Developed and maintained multiple client projects using various technologies including React, Django, and AWS.
